scripts.dev: concurrently -n agent,metro -c blue,green "pnpm run dev:agent" "pnpm run dev:mobile"
scripts.dev:agent: cd packages/agent && source .venv/bin/activate && cd src && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
